players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of Diana who was killed? That seems suspicious."
You: "Charlie, your story doesn't add up. If you're the detective, why not investigate Diana who was killed? Sounds like you're trying to frame me as the mafia."
You: "Let's vote for Charlie; his story is too convenient and doesn't add up."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result immediately at the start of the day? That timing feels off."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice because I suspected her from the start. Diana's death confirmed my suspicion - mafia wouldn't kill their own. Vote Alice now or we lose!"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
